transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haanji madam.
Customer: Uh, hi, yeh Maurya fragrance se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Yes madam.
Customer: Uh, sir, main senior manager baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Aapki baat hui hogi aapke account manager Shivam se.
Executive: Yes madam.
Customer: Ji, aapka ek ticket open hua tha sir regarding of the services, aapka kuch and aapne bataya tha ki aapke partner, aapka ek ticket open hua tha sir regarding of the services.
Customer: Haan, woh mere ko Shivam mere ko call kar rahe the, call vgera karne ke liye toh main, main call kar hi nahi pa raha. Dedh mahine shuru mein main active tha lekin baad mein jab mera business down ho raha tha, mujhe lag raha tha kaam nahi aage badh payega. Toh maine Shivam ko bataya ki aap mere ko baar baar call kar rahe ho lekin main aapko bata nahi pa raha hu main business abhi saat aath mahine chala hi nahi pa raha hu. Agar possible ho toh aap mera refund kar dijiye zyada achha hai at least aap roz call karte ho mujhe achha nahi lagta kyuki main bhi saat aath mahine mera business kuch nahi hone ja raha isme.
Executive: Hmm. Sir, matlab only problem is there na ki refund policies nahi hai sir. Aap dekho aapka jo aapka issue kya hai matlab aap use nahi kyun nahi kar paate hain sir? Jaan sakti hu Mishra ji ki matlab problem kya aata hai sir?
Customer: Main, bhai jab main aapki lead use kar sakta hu. Aap log IndiaMART mujhe client de dega lekin mere paas product deliver karne ke liye hai hi nahi toh main call kyun karu?
Executive: Product aapka toh business chal raha tha sir toh product deliver ka kya issue aa gaya matlab ekdum se?
Customer: Mera pehle Amazon Flipkart pe chota mota tha woh main self kar le raha tha lekin abhi jab partner saath mein business baat hua ki IndiaMART se bade order milte hain toh hum log IndiaMART pe jaake kaam kar sakte hain. Toh hum logo ne aap logo se approval hoke hi humne amount payment kiya ki ab leads aayengi achhi hum kar lenge. Lekin woh ek toh hai nahi, hume kaam dekhna padta hai bahar ka, woh koi call kar nahi rahe hain, kuch ho nahi raha, main akele kab tak khichunga toh yeh disputes wali baat paida ho gayi. Maine kaha main paisa bhi kharch kar raha hu aap log jaake IndiaMART wale itni lead de rahe hain aap kyun nahi call karte ho unko? Toh woh phir mujhe laga ki akele mein woh dispute wali baat ho gayi na, main itna kar raha hu aap nahi kar rahe ho toh woh phir mujhe laga ki paise main aur kaha kaha dalunga jaake?
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Toh yeh cheez ho gayi. Yeh ho gaya. Maine un logo ko bola ki maine account purchase kar liya aap please at least call karo, client ko leke aao, main deliver kar raha hu, mera delivery ka kaam hai. Lekin jab woh active hi nahi hai toh main akele kya kya handle karunga? Aap log phone mere ko kar rahe ho baar baar insist kar rahe ho toh internally toh main jaanta hu na main kya kya face kar raha hu. Toh
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Isliye maine Shivam se kaha yaar bhai main jab dekh lunga koi achha banda aadmi milega jab main run kar lunga dobara phir registration karwa lunga. Lekin abhi filhaal saat aath mahine mera kuch hoga nahi aur yeh paise mere 30-35 hazaar rupay bekar jaane wale hain. Isme kuch nahi hoga.
Executive: Waise dekho aap visibility bhi matter karti hai na toh aap ek kaam karo, aisa kar lete hain na Mishra ji, dekho refund policies toh sir nahi hai woh nahi hogi kyuki yeh yeh agar aapne karaya tha toh ab yeh jo issue hai yeh aapka look out hai ki aapke partners nahi kar rahe hain. Ha, yeh kar sakte hain sir.
Customer: Nahi na woh baat nahi hai. Mere personal problem nahi hai, maine jab kiya tha tabhi baat hui thi ki main monthly plan lene ke mood mein tha unhone kaha tha ki agar aapko aisa lagta nahi chalega toh hum refund kar sakte hain toh phir humne unhi ke bharose pe hi pura payment ek baar mein kar diya.
Executive: Toh aapko jinhone yeh refund ke liye bola tha unhone aapko kuch written vgera diya hai toh aap mujhe de do main aage escalate kar deti hu. But aisa hota nahi hai sir dekho agar within aap aisa yeh policies thi tha ki within aapko 90 days mein aapka agar teen months ke andar hota hai 90 days mein agar kuch aisa issue aata hai toh aap le sakte hain. But us time pe bhi aapne nahi liya toh
Customer: Main agar main agar 15 August mein maine liya hai yeh plan aur 15 August September October hi hua hai November mein hi maine bol diya tha main refund lena hai mere ko. 15 August mein maine bol diya maine.
Executive: Sir aapne do order liya tha August se, ek minute, September, October, November, 2 November aapka lapse hua hai, hai na? 2 November aapka lapse hua hai, teen mahine nahi hue hain. Sir main aapka point samajh rahi hu Mishra ji lekin dekho mere ko sir koi personal fayda nahi hai. Agar kuch agar genuinely aapka refund ho sakta hai ya karwa paati ya company policies mein hota toh hum karwa dete sir aisa koi issue nahi hai. Lekin yeh jo issue aap woh bol rahe ho na isme ab woh cheez possible nahi hai sir. Isliye main us cheez ko aapka sahi karne ke liye hi ek cheez aapko suggest karungi ki sir aap abhi ek do mahina jo beech mein use nahi kar pa rahe ho koi baat nahi aap apna visibility ko rakho. Service toh pure saal ki hai na, do mahine baad isko start kar lena.
Customer: Mam, do mahine mein kya abhi saal bhar bhi kuch nahi hone wala mujhe pata hai main agar lena hoga main dobara payment karke le lunga mujhe business karna hoga IndiaMART se aur bhi mahnge mahnge package aapke paas honge mujhe sab pata hai na. 30-35 hazaar wala liya mere ko 60 hazaar wala package bhi offer hua tha. Main woh bhi le sakta hu lekin main kyun lunga jab mujhe pata hai ki yeh paise mein na call ho rahi hai na kuch ho raha activity toh yeh 30-35 hazaar rupay bekar jaane wale hain, bilkul jayenge bekar mujhe pata hai, business nahi kuch hone ja raha ek saal abhi at least.
Executive: Sir aapka point aap. Sir dekhiye aap Mishra ji aap bhi toh samjho na sir koi company ki bhi toh koi policies hai na, company bhi toh policy ke according chalegi na.
Customer: Mujhe mujhe toh yahi policy pata thi.
Executive: Na aise toh sir achha ek baat batao kal agar yeh policies hoti toh kal ko customer pura 12 mahine service use karne ke baad 12ve mahine bol deta main toh aapko mere ko refund de do. Kya aise possible hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi woh aapka customer bol raha hai agar aapko lagta hai maine toh yeh baat teen mahine baad aapko bata di.
Executive: Aapka customer bol raha hai.
Customer: Maine 12 mahine 9 mahine wali baat nahi hai.
Executive: Aapne thoda late ho gaya, aapne bataya toh thoda late kar diya.
Customer: Chaar saat din ho gaye main chaar saat din late ho gaya aap 5% 10% jo bhi.
Executive: Sir pehle suniye sir. 90% ka matlab aap samajh rahe hain? 90 days matlab 90 days hota hai. 90 days se ek aage bhi main ek ek din bhi nahi kar sakti aur agar 90 days bhi aap bolte ho toh 90 days mein bhi sir aisa woh nahi hai ki matlab aap yeh aap khud socho na aapne starting bhi jaise aap join kara toh aapne kuch toh soch ke kiya hoga na aur sir aapko dealing bhi aaya hai lekin ab aap aap khud socho na jaha aap Flipkart ko order ek chota mote order deliver kar rahe ho aap retail order le lo IndiaMART se aap mat lo bulk order.
Customer: Nahi madam main na Flipkart kar raha hu abhi na Amazon kar raha hu kyuki woh toh marketing ka point of view tha ki haan Flipkart mein marketing hoti hai waha paise kuch nahi milte woh log 15-15 30% commission lete hain uske baad mein GST bhi karta hai usme kuch hota hai woh marketing ka zariya hai ki company marketing lekin IndiaMART se mujhe bade order ke liye hi kiya tha business badhana tha. Pehle woh 60 hazaar ka package de rahe the IndiaMART ka lekin maine kaha pehle 35 hazaar wala try karte hain agar isme achha response hoga toh hum aage jayenge.
Executive: Sir jab aapko business badha rahe the na sir koi aapse aisa thodi tha sir ki humne aapko koi business ghatane ke liye aapko diye sir. Humne toh profit ke liye diye na sir.
Customer: Haan lekin mujhe pata hai. Dekho meri taraf se call hoga nahi aap log saat din mein chhe din mein team call karti rehti hai sir aap call nahi kar rahe ho mere paas koi jawab nahi hai iska. Main pehle bol chuka hu mera business band ho gaya ab kya call hoga?
Executive: Toh sir aisa kar lo dekho main aapka point samajh gayi dekho sir 30 din mein ek baar connectivity aur us pe deni chahiye aur aapka aapka bhi us pe connect hona chahiye. Aap chahte ho aapke jo account manager hai Shivam woh aapko call nahi karenge lekin woh ek mahine mein ek baar aapko connect zaroor karenge aap unse saari cheeze connect karke baat zaroor karenge.
Customer: Nahi bhai woh formality hai yeh madam yeh baar baar aap call rakh lo.
Executive: Formality aapko agar aisa lag raha hai formality wali baat hai sir but hum aapke benefit ke liye hi kar rahe hain taaki market aapki sir aaj nahi kal saal bhar baad aapko zaroorat toh padegi na.
Customer: Maurya fragrance naam toh chahiye hoga.
Executive: Nahi bhi chahiye toh koi baat nahi sir ab jo jo chal raha hai usko toh chalne dijiye.
Customer: Main chalne wala toh main normal profile bhi IndiaMART pe bana sakta hu chalne wala toh normal profile pe visibility hona zaroori hai na sir normal profile ka visibility kaise hoga?
Executive: Woh woh free mein milta hai. In short sir ji aap in short sir Mishra sir aap cheezo ko please samajhne ka koshish kijiye ki aapka refund nahi ho sakta hai. Ab aapko yeh service chalani hai ya nahi chalani hai sir woh aapke upar hai.
Customer: Nahi mere ko toh jo bhai dekho commitment diya gaya main woh jaanta hu. Ab aap keh rahe ho aapki baat main.
Executive: Aap mujhe written commitment de do sir. Haan aap mujhe koi written commitment de do jo aapko company aap jisne bhi aapko diya hai. Aap unko bolo phir call karke.
Customer: Nahi mere ko main full payment karta hi nahi agar aisa hota toh full payment karta hi kyun?
Executive: Ab yeh wohi baat sir aap bol rahe ho main aapko bola sir.
Customer: Sir monthly package bhi IndiaMART deta hai.
Executive: Sir monthly package nahi deta deta tha sir ab band ho gaya hai mere pass aap chahe toh try kar lo kisi bhi.
Customer: Band ho gaya lekin maine monthly isliye nahi liya kyuki mujhe pata tha ki mera refund yaar nahi milega unhone kaha nahi monthly aap ho jaata refund maine kiya hai maine nahi liya. Ab kahi ek banda bhejne mein dijiye naam batao main naam aap logo ko jaanta nahi hu mere paas mein IndiaMART se call aayi thi.
Executive: Matlab aap chaah rahe ho IndiaMART se aapko koi call na aaye. Aap yahi chaah rahe ho na IndiaMART se aapko koi call na aaye?
Customer: Nahi nahi main yeh nahi chaah raha hu. Main yeh chaah raha hu ki mera refund mile mujhe kyuki mera paisa bekar jayega is saal.
Executive: Nahi milega sir main aapka point samajh rahi hu lekin woh policy nahi hai refund nahi mil sakta. Ab aap dekho sir abhi.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund due to business downturn.

- Feels calls are a waste without business.

- Partners are not active on the platform.



Resolution:

- Explained that refund policies do not exist.

- Suggested maintaining visibility and resuming later.

- Account manager will connect once a month.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, policies, visibility
